means: 结束，终止
推断
议定
得出结论
缔结
推断出
决定
终了
作出决定或达成协议

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含"结束，完成"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: complete, finish, end, close, conclude, terminate, accomplish
means: complete ： 侧重指完成预定的任务或使某事完善，补足缺少的部分等。
finish ： 与complete基本同义，着重圆满地结束或完成已着手的事。
end ： 最普通用词，着重事情的完成。也指某种活动因达到目的而自然结束或由于某种原因而突然中止。
close ： 普通用词，着重行为的终止或结束，不强调其目的。
conclude ： 正式用词，多指以某事或活动达到预期目的而告终。
terminate ： 强调有一个空间和时间的限度，届时必须终止。书面语用词。
accomplish ： 正式用词，强调一个过程的完成；也可指依靠努力达到一定目的，或取得一定的结果。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含"推断"之意。
means: infer ： 指从已提供的论据或从已接受的前提出发而推断出的结论。
deduce ： 指有充分根据的推论，也指逻辑学上的演绎。
conclude ： 指得出符合逻辑的结论。
gather ： 指从听到的情况推测、判定。
judge ： 多指经过仔细鉴定或评价之后作出决断。

sentence.Network_en: If the clubs cannot conclude a deal, an independent tribunal will decide.
sentence.Network_cn: 如果俱乐部之间无法达成协议，将由一个独立的仲裁委员会来裁定。

sentence.Network_en: This has made many Americans conclude that business ethics is an oxymoron.
sentence.Network_cn: 这使得很多美国人断定商业道德是个自相矛盾的说法。

sentence.Network_en: The competitors cantered into the arena to conclude the closing ceremony.
sentence.Network_cn: 选手们慢跑进入竞技场，为闭幕式画上了句号。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... contemporary 同时代的 conclude 结束；总结 confirm 坚定；证实.
定_百度百科 ... （16） 止；停止[ stop] （17） 判定，断定[ conclude] （1） 一定[ certainly].
人教版高中英语必修5单词_百度文库 ... scientific 科学的 adj. conclude 结束；推断出 vt.&vi. conclusion 结论；结束.
英语学习基本词汇 - 豆丁网 ... concert 音乐会 conclude 得出结论（动） condition 条件.

list.abs: 高中英语重点短语汇编 ... 11. be similar to 与…相似 12. to conclude 最后；总而言之 13. complain about 抱怨….
汽车专业英语从零开始... ... 106. derive from 取得 107. to conclude 最后；总之 108. try something different 试试别的；进行不.
航海及海运专业词汇英语翻译(C) ... concluding line 绳梯中央绳 concluding report 总结报告 conclusion of agreement 缔结协议.
3．结论句（concluding sentence）----对整个段落进行归纳总结。例如：Travel has become more and more popular(主题句).
3）结尾段（Concluding Paragraph）：对全文归纳总结。一般可采用以下四种方式对全文进行归纳：a．简明归纳全文；b．回顾主题…

jx.jx_en_mean: (Scots Law)(of a buyer) sign a contract with the vendor of a property or piece of land to signify change of ownership
jx.jx_cn_mean: (苏格兰律)（买方）与卖方签署房地产买卖合同以表明所有权改变

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English (in the sense 'convince'): from Latin concludere, from con- 'completely' + claudere 'to shut'

entry.def: If you conclude that something is true, you decide that it is true using the facts you know as a basis.

example.ex: Larry had concluded that he had no choice but to accept Paul's words as the truth...
example.tran: 拉里断定自己别无选择，只能当保罗的话是真的。

example.ex: So what can we conclude from this debate?...
example.tran: 那么从这场辩论中我们能得出什么结论？

entry.def: When you conclude, you say the last thing that you are going to say.

example.ex: 'It's a waste of time,' he concluded...
I would like to conclude by saying that I do enjoy your magazine.
example.tran: 最后，我想说我的确很喜欢你们的杂志。

entry.def: When something concludes, or when you conclude it, you end it.

example.ex: The evening concluded with dinner and speeches...
example.tran: 这个夜晚在宴会和讲话中结束。

example.ex: The Group of Seven major industrial countries concluded its annual summit meeting today.
example.tran: 由主要工业国家组成的七国集团今天结束了其年度峰会。

entry.def: If one person or group concludes an agreement, such as a treaty or business deal, with another, they arrange it. You can also say that two people or groups conclude an agreement.

example.ex: Mexico and the Philippines have both concluded agreements with their commercial bank creditors...
example.tran: 墨西哥和菲律宾均已与商业银行债权人达成了协议。

example.ex: If the clubs cannot conclude a deal, an independent tribunal will decide.
example.tran: 如果俱乐部之间无法达成协议，将由一个独立的仲裁委员会来裁定。

means.word_mean: 1. decide by reasoning; draw or come to a conclusion;

sentences.sentence: "We reasoned that it was cheaper to rent than to buy a house"

means.word_mean: 3. reach a conclusion after a discussion or deliberation

sentences.sentence: "The concert closed with a nocturne by Chopin"

auth_sentence.res_content: To conclude that emotions are physically residual defies intelligence.

stems_affixes.word_buile: conclude[[v.结论;终结]]男→adj.决定性的;结论性的
exclude[[v.排除,隔绝]]→adj.排外的, 孤高的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 排除, 除外, 被排除在外的事物
stems_affixes.word_buile: exclude[[v.排除,隔绝]]→n.排除, 除外, 被排除在外的事物
occlude[[v.闭塞,堵塞]]男稳荽省鷑.闭塞,堵塞
preclude[[v.妨碍;阻止]]→n.排除, 阻止
con全部+clud关闭+e→全部关掉→结束
oc一再+clude=clud关闭→一再关起来不畅通→堵塞
pre预先,提前+clud关闭+e→提前关闭→阻止
se分开+clud关闭+e→分开关→隐居的

Sentence.sentence: We can conclude from the passage that romantic love is becoming increasingly important in family relationships.
The researchers concluded that role model selection can have a positive or negative outcome on a teenager's psychosocial development.

Researchers studying teenagers in Israel concluded that, in that hazardous environment, mobile phones were regarded as "security objects" in parent-teen relationships―important because they provided the possibility ofcontact and communication at all times.
When those were finished, she concluded the session with a brief restatement of how the new system would improve security and peace of mind in the municipal building.

jushi.english: The press conference concluded at four o'clock.
jushi.chinese: 新闻发布会在四点结束。

jushi.english: The meeting concluded after three hours.
